dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights. Depth shown by soundings. North is oriented towards upper right of map. Map shows distances of furthest visibility of lighthouses, sea rocks and reefs, anchorages, distances from coast in nautical miles, canals, marshes, rivers. Three classes of railroads, roads and streets, political boundaries. Archaeological sites, mines, radio stations, airports, lighthouses.
dct_publisher_sm: Athēnai : synthesis kai schediasis Gkika M. Kousa / 1954.
Αθήναι : σύνθεσις και σχεδίασις Γκίκας Μ. Κούστας / 1954.
